issue.title: kick.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://kick.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fkick.com)
### Comment
> Whenever I have AdGuard DNS on, Kick app does not load the content. I have also tried it on my Mi Box (Android TV). It works on browser, though, so it seems to be something specific to the app.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/4u1zdyh4mfwgwcs4g4g0o0wk8cc0ocg6hbs21f7po0.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/900jvml1ihc8cs88kos4g0os0kwks0odz3qytwtqy8.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | `Android TV and Galaxy S25 (latest build)`
Browser: | The Kick app does not load with AdGuard DNS.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: m.place.naver.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.place.naver.com/restaurant/1612703330/home?entry=pll](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.place.naver.com%2Frestaurant%2F1612703330%2Fhome%3Fentry%3Dpll) ### Comment > The Share button that appears on search results (for locations/places) on the Naver Map service is hidden and not visible. This issue occurs not only on the detailed place page but also on the integrated search results page and virtually all other related pages. The 'Share' functionality is being blocked across the board. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
